Class GameEffects

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.render.GameEffects
public class GameEffects extends Object
Handles visual effects and animations for the game UI. Separates animation logic from the main controller to improve code organization.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameEffects

      public GameEffects()

  • Method Details

    • animateLockPulse

      public void animateLockPulse(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rectangle)
      Animates a lock pulse effect on a rectangle. Creates a scale transition that pulses the rectangle up and back down.
      Parameters:
      rectangle - The rectangle to animate

    • animateLockBlock

      public void animateLockBlock(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle[][] displayMatrix, int[][] brickData, int xPos, int yPos)
      Animates a lock pulse effect on multiple rectangles that form a block.
      Parameters:
      displayMatrix - The matrix of rectangles representing the game board
      brickData - The block shape data
      xPos - The X position of the block
      yPos - The Y position of the block

    • shakeBoard

      public void shakeBoard(javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane gameBoard)
      Creates a screen shake effect on the game board. Shakes the board randomly by small amounts and returns to center.
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - The BorderPane representing the game board to shake

    • flashAllBlocks

      public void flashAllBlocks(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle[][] displayMatrix, Consumer<javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle> postFlashEffect)
      Flashes all visible blocks on the board for 0.2 seconds. Used when rows are cleared to help the player re-orient themselves.
      Parameters:
      displayMatrix - The matrix of rectangles representing the game board
      postFlashEffect - Callback to apply after flash completes (e.g., phantom mode fade)

    • illuminateArea

      public void illuminateArea(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle[][] displayMatrix, int boardRow, int boardCol, Consumer<javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle> postIlluminationEffect)
      Illuminates a 2x2 radius around the given position for 0.2 seconds. Used when a block locks to briefly highlight the area.
      Parameters:
      displayMatrix - The matrix of rectangles representing the game board
      boardRow - The row index in the board matrix (0-based, including hidden rows)
      boardCol - The column index in the board matrix (0-based)
      postIlluminationEffect - Callback to apply after illumination completes (e.g., phantom mode fade)
